Package it.polito.dp2.WF

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ActionReader
    An interface for accessing the description of an action within a workflow.
    ActionStatusReader
    An interface for accessing information about the status of an action instance.
    ProcessActionReader
    An interface for accessing the description of a process action within a workflow.
    ProcessReader
    An interface for accessing information about a process.
    SimpleActionReader
    An interface for accessing the description of a simple action within a workflow.
    WorkflowMonitor
    An interface for monitoring Workflow data.
    WorkflowReader
    An interface for reading the data associated with a workflow.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Actor
    This immutable class represents information about an actor who can take over workflow action executions.
    WorkflowMonitorFactory
    Defines a factory API that enables applications to obtain one or more objects implementing the WorkflowMonitor interface.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    WorkflowMonitorException
    Thrown if an implementation of WorkflowMonitor cannot be created.
  • Error Summary 
    Error Description
    FactoryConfigurationError
    Thrown if the implementation of the concrete factory is not available or cannot be instantiated.
